text.subtitle: Learn about my work, my experience and the projects I build.

Originally from Iran, I studied Industrial Engineering at Payam Noor University in Urmia and worked for five years in accounting before moving to the Netherlands. After discovering my interest in coding, I decided to change my career and joined the
text.part2: program, where I learned modern web development and gained real project experience through teamwork and clean coding practices. Iâ€™m confident working with React, and I enjoy UI design, problem-solving, and collaborating with others. Iâ€™m responsible, motivated, and a fast learner who is always improving and growing as a developer.
